com.projetloki.genesis.image

Class Shaper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.projetloki.genesis.image.Shaper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hashable

    public abstract class Shaper
extends Object
implements Hashable
    A Shape factory to construct shapes fitting the size of an image.

    Shapers are immutable. All the methods transforming a shaper, e.g. flipX(), return a new shaper which is the result of the transformation and leave the original shaper unmodified.

    All methods return serializable shapers as long as this and the arguments are serializable.

    Author:
    Cl√©ment Roux
    See Also:
    Shapers, Image.mask(Shaper)

      • pad

        public Shaper pad(int topPadding,
         int rightPadding,
         int bottomPadding,
         int leftPadding)
        Returns a factory which, given a rectangle, generates a shape fitting the rectangle minus the given borders using this.
        Parameters:
        topPadding - the width of the top border. Can be negative.
        rightPadding - the width of the right border. Can be negative.
        bottomPadding - the width of the bottom border. Can be negative.
        leftPadding - the width of the left border. Can be negative.
        Returns:
        a padded copy of this shaper
